# datadog_security_monitoring_critical_asset (Data Source)

Use this data source to retrieve information about an existing critical asset.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "datadog_security_monitoring_critical_asset" "my_critical_asset" {
  id = "1dab677c-5eb4-4ac8-b1d3-444bf0117e19"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The ID of the critical asset.

### Read-Only

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the critical asset is enabled.
- `query` (String) The query used to match a critical asset and the associated signals.
- `rule_query` (String) The rule query to filter which detection rules this critical asset applies to.
- `severity` (String) The severity change applied to signals matching this critical asset.
- `tags` (List of String) A list of tags associated with the critical asset.
